  <strong style="display: block;">A founder owns 60%. A new round issues shares equal to 50% of existing shares. What will be the founder’s new ownership?</strong>

  <label><input type="radio" name="module1_mcq_q94" value="D"> D. 45%</label><br>
  <label><input type="radio" name="module1_mcq_q94" value="E"> E. 40%</label><br>
</form> 

<div id="feedback-module1_mcq_q94" class="feedback" data-status="" style="display:none;"> 
✅ Correct: E. After dilution, founder’s % = 60 ÷ (1 + 0.5) = 40%.
